en.<p>Too many ProtonMail accounts have bee:
Too many ProtonMail accounts have been created from your connection.

Thus, we are requesting additional verification to ensure you are human and not a spam bot.

Because Tor is frequently abused by spammers, this check may be triggered because of the Tor exit node you are using.

Before you can receive emails for your c.Info: Before you can receive emails for your custom domain addresses at ProtonMail, you need to add the following MX record to your DNS. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Before you can start sending and receivi.Info: Before you can start sending and receiving emails from your new addresses you need to create encryption keys for them. 4096-bit keys only work on high performance computers. For most users, we recommend using 2048-bit keys.

en.If you are resetting the Login password: If you are resetting the Login password only, old messages can be recovered later if you know your existing Mailbox Password. Learn More.

If you have any questions, you can email.Info: If you have any questions, you can email us at contact@protonmail.ch. Thank you again for your support!

en.If you have never used 2FA before, we st: If you have never used 2FA before, we strongly recommend you reading our 2FA Guide first.

If you have questions or need help, plea.Info: If you have questions or need help, please visit our support page to find troubleshooting guides and contact our support team. If you find a bug in ProtonMail, please let us know! You can send us a bug report by clicking Report bugs (1)

If you have set both SPF and DKIM, DMARC.Info: If you have set both SPF and DKIM, DMARC allows you to specify how other email services should deliver email for your domain if both SPF and DKIM checks have failed. This can make it harder for spammers pretending to be you but may also cause delivery issues if not done properly. Feel free to ignore and skip DMARC unless you really want strict policies such as p=quarantine or p=reject.

If you lose your mailbox password, you w.Info: If you lose your mailbox password, you will not be able to read your emails. We cannot recover this password for you.

If you lose your password, you will not.Info: If you lose your password, you will not be able to read your emails.

en.If you remember your old password later,: If you remember your old password later, you can recover your existing messages. Learn More.

If you want to keep an existing SPF reco.Info: If you want to keep an existing SPF record, you can just add include:_spf.protonmail.ch to it after the v=spf1. Do not create multiple SPF records.

Keep this record in your DNS for as long.Info: Keep this record in your DNS for as long as you want to use DKIM. You can change its Value to off to disable DKIM

Labels are a powerful tool to manage you.Info: Labels are a powerful tool to manage your inbox. You can add and remove labels from selected emails by clicking the Label button (1). You can also add, delete, and edit labels by clicking on Labels / Folders (2).

Non-original <strong>@protonmail</strong.Info: Non-original @protonmail addresses can never be deleted (only disabled). This means that once you create an address it will always count towards your address limit. Custom domain addresses must be disabled before they can be deleted. Custom domain addresses can only be deleted if all messages associated with that address are deleted.

ProtonMail addresses can never be delete.Info: ProtonMail addresses can never be deleted (only disabled). ProtonMail addresses will always count towards your address limit whether enabled or not. Learn more

ProtonMail allows you to fully customize.Info: ProtonMail allows you to fully customize your inbox experience. By clicking (1) you can quickly switch between two possible layouts. You can set a default layout, set your composer style, adjust button layouts, and even switch themes under Settings --> Appearance (2)

ProtonMail can also be used with a singl.Info: ProtonMail can also be used with a single password which replaces both the login and mailbox password. To switch to single password mode, enter the single password you would like to use and click Save.

ProtonMail cannot be reached right now,.Error: ProtonMail cannot be reached right now, please try again later.

ProtonMail supports both column and row.Info: ProtonMail supports both column and row layouts for the inbox. Using this setting, it is possible to change between the two layouts.

en.ProtonMail supports DKIM signing for cus: ProtonMail supports DKIM signing for custom domains! To use DKIM authentication, please add the following TXT record into your DNS for this domain. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

This page is only available on larger re.Info: This page is only available on larger resolution devices. If you are on a  phone, try landscape mode, or visit on a computer instead.

This sets the default composer size. Two.Info: This sets the default composer size. Two sizes are available, a smaller popup composer, and a bigger full screen composer.

This short tutorial will show you the ma.Info: This short tutorial will show you the main features of your new ProtonMail account. For more information, you can also check out the Welcome email we have sent you. If you ever want to view this tutorial again, you can access it by clicking your username in the upper right corner.

This will be your new ProtonMail email a.Info: This will be your new ProtonMail email address.

This will downgrade your account to a free account.

Active aliases and custom domain addresses will be disabled automatically.

ProtonMail is free software that is supported by donations and paid accounts. Please consider making a donation so we can continue to offer the service for free.

en.This wizard will enable Two Factor Authe: This wizard will enable Two Factor Authentication (2FA) on your ProtonMail account. 2FA will make your ProtonMail account more secure so we recommend enabling it.

To fight spam, please verify you are hum.Info: To fight spam, please verify you are human.

To pay with Bitcoin, please follow the <.Info: To pay with Bitcoin, please follow the instructions here. To pay via Cash, please email us at contact@protonmail.ch for instructions.

To re-order your addresses or change you.Help: To re-order your addresses or change your signature(s), go to Identities

Two-password mode uses separate password.Info: Two-password mode uses separate passwords for login and mailbox decryption. This provides a minor security benefit in some situations, however we recommend one-password mode for most users. To switch to two password mode, enter the login and mailbox password you would like to use and click Save.

Two-password mode uses separate passwords for login and mailbox decryption. This provides a minor security benefit in some situations, however we recommend one-password mode for most users. To switch to two password mode, first set a login password and then set a mailbox password.

We are sorry to see you go!.Title: We are sorry to see you go!

We do not permanently save your email or.Info: We do not permanently save your email or phone number, it is deleted after verification.

We only accept PayPal for annual subscri.Info: We only accept PayPal for annual subscriptions, click the link to switch to an annual subscription.

We recommend adding a recovery email add.Info: We recommend adding a recovery email address first. Otherwise, you cannot recover your account if something goes wrong.

We recommend using different login and m.Info: We recommend using different login and mailbox passwords.

Without activation you will not be able.Info: Without activation you will not be able to create new users, add addresses to existing users, or access non-private user accounts.

Wrong verification code. Please make sur.Error: Wrong verification code. Please make sure you copied the verification code correctly and try again. It can take up to 24 hours for changes to take affect.

You are in Private Mode or have Session.Error: You are in Private Mode or have Session Storage disabled. Please deactivate Private Mode and then reload the page. More information here.

You can drag and drop addresses to order.Help: You can drag and drop addresses to order them.

You can enable authentication logging to.Info: You can enable authentication logging to see when your account is accessed, and from which IP. We will record the IP address that accesses the account and the time, as well as failed attempts.

You have lost access to your organizatio.Info: You have lost access to your organization keys. Without restoration you will not be able to create new users, add addresses to existing users, or access non-private user accounts.

You have no contacts, you can add contac.Info: You have no contacts, you can add contact with the above button 'ADD CONTACT'.

Your organization password can be shared.Info: Your organization password can be shared with other users you wish to give administrative privileges. It is also an emergency recovery code to gain access to your organization in case you lose access to your account. Please save this password and keep it safe.
